'''Fascinating Phenocryst''' is an event currency for the event [[Secret Summer Paradise]].

They are obtained by completing and claiming the rewards from challenges in the "Attractions" section. Earning the sufficient allow claiming rewards from the "Night Star's Promise" section, including [[Layla]].
